description: When attempting to sort a list of values using the scipy library, a compile-time error is encountered which states "TypeError: 'scipy.ndarray' object does not support item assignment". This indicates that the scipy library is not compatible with the sort function
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):

    return float(sum(numbers)) / max(len(n
NameError: name 'n' is not defined
